```{r}
select()
```

## Cleaning Data Part 1
```{r}
#renaming and mutating
fooddata <-
  fooddata %>%
  filter(row_number() > 1)%>%
  rename(pop = 'POP2010',
         housingunits = 'OHU2010',
         lowinc = "TractLOWI",
    novehicle = 'TractHUNV',
         SNAP = 'TractSNAP')%>%
  mutate(novehicle=(novehicle/pop)*100, SNAP=(SNAP/pop)*100, lowinc=(lowinc/pop)*100, minoritypop=((TractBlack+TractAsian+TractNHOPI+TractAIAN+TractOMultir+TractHispanic)/pop)*100)
head(fooddata)
```


##Variable Selection
```{r}
#selecting
fooddata <-
  fooddata %>%
    group_by(State)%>%
  filter(row_number() > 1)%>%
  select(State, County, pop, housingunits, minoritypop, Urban, PovertyRate, MedianFamilyIncome, novehicle, SNAP)
head(fooddata)
```

##Joining
```{r}
joined<-
  fooddata%>%
  left_join((str(usmap::us_map(regions="counties"))), County=counties)%>%
  select(County, State, County, pop, housingunits, minoritypop, Urban, PovertyRate, MedianFamilyIncome, novehicle, SNAP)
```


##Graphing
```{r}
#GRAPH1
usmap::plot_usmap("counties", fill = "blue", alpha = .25) 
```


```{r}
#GRAPH2
fooddata %>%
  group_by(State, County) %>%
  filter(novehicle > 0)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=PovertyRate, y=novehicle)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  facet_wrap(~Urban) +
  xlim(0,5)+
  ylim(0,3)
```
